text: We are turning off domain stylesheets from automatically being included in theme pages/templates for all new themes going forward. If you would like to enable domain stylesheets for a new theme or want to turn off domain stylesheets for an existing theme, you can set `enable_domain_stylesheets` to `true` or `false` in the `theme.json` config. See <https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-theme-boilerplate/blob/679fecb36b96c858fc1be655840a8594c3363bef/src/theme.json#L4> for an example
